core:endProcessAction.core:comment: Represents a choice of return to sales or a failure of this process

core:action.core:comment: Use Voucher Type Id if supplied to select voucher type. Usual problem with region though.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Check if there's entered data at the point of the button press, use the data as the entered amount

core:state.core:comment: Fixes the problem when there's a problem with the serial and CaptureSerialNumber returns fail and the pos doesn't have a prompt after the error prompt.
